replies.author: 甜丶豆包
replies.txt_content:
安装方法不对，zip包里有英文版安装方法

HOW TO INSTALL:
如何安装：
1. Install Forge
1.安装 Forge
2. Copy everything found in /setup/ folder into your .minecraft/ folder
2.复制setup文件夹里的所有文件到游戏目录
3a. Enjoy.
3-a.玩吧~
3b. Edit /mods/ruins.txt, and any template files for weight, to fine-tune your experience.
3-b.什么什么什么的看不懂...

3a、3b是两种安装方法，貌似是，算了，交给鸟语高手去翻译吧...

HOW TO INSTALL:
如何安装：
1. Install Forge
1.安装 Forge
2. Copy everything found in /setup/ folder into your .minecraft/ folder
2.复制setup文件夹里的所有文件到游戏目录
3a. Enjoy.
3-a.玩吧~
3b. Edit /mods/ruins.txt, and any template files for weight, to fine-tune your experience.
